actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to revise the authorization for long-term leasing of military family housing to be constructed.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of a military department or the Secretary of Transportation with respect to the Coast Guard to enter into a contract for the lease of family housing units to be constructed or rehabilitated to military (currently, residential) use near a military installation in the United States at which there is a shortage of family housing. Terminates a requirement that information concerning proposed lease contracts for such housing be included in the annual budget materials submitted by the Secretaries of Defense and Transportation. Provides for the budget scoring of such contracts for purposes of their impact on defense budgets.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to revise the authorization for long-term leasing of military family housing to be constructed.
